caption.p:
Pollen stained with lactophenol cotton blue. a, b
Spartina anglica , fertile pollen [Canada, British Columbia, Williams 2004-3 (CAN)] c
Spartina ×townsendii , sterile pollen [England, Hampshire, 1877, Groves s.n. (CAN)] d
Spartina ×townsendii , sterile pollen [Canada, British Columbia, Saarela & Percy 791 (CAN)]
